comment: Айшара баркает и выстрелом ранит Равора

languages.text: "Старый еретик! Ответишь за это в допросных палатах!"
"You old heretic! You'll answer for this in the interrogation chambers!"
languages.original_text: "Старый еретик! Ответишь за это в допросных палатах!"

traits.locale_text: "You old heretic! You'll answer for this in the interrogation chambers!"
"You old heretic! You'll answer for this in the interrogation chambers!"
"You old heretic! You'll answer for this in the interrogation chambers!"
"You old heretic! You'll answer for this in the interrogation chambers!"
"You old heretic! You'll answer for this in the interrogation chambers!"
"You old heretic! You'll answer for this in the interrogation chambers!"

languages.text: “你这该死的异端分子！我要把你带到审讯室，让你如实招供！”
languages.original_text: "You old heretic! You'll answer for this in the interrogation chambers!"

traits.locale_text: “你这该死的异端分子！我要把你带到审讯室，让你如实招供！”

languages.text: "Ketzerischer Abschaum! Dafür werdet Ihr in den Verhörkammern büßen!"
languages.original_text: "You old heretic! You'll answer for this in the interrogation chambers!"

traits.locale_text: "Ketzerischer Abschaum! Dafür werdet Ihr in den Verhörkammern büßen!"

languages.text: «¡Vejestorio hereje! ¡Responderás por esto en las cámaras de interrogatorio!».
languages.original_text: "You old heretic! You'll answer for this in the interrogation chambers!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Vejestorio hereje! ¡Responderás por esto en las cámaras de interrogatorio!».

languages.text: « Infâme hérétique ! Vous répondrez de vos actes dans nos salles d'interrogatoire ! »
languages.original_text: "You old heretic! You'll answer for this in the interrogation chambers!"

traits.locale_text: « Infâme hérétique ! Vous répondrez de vos actes dans nos salles d'interrogatoire ! »

languages.text: 「この異端者め！責任はお前にある！尋問室へ来い！」
languages.original_text: "You old heretic! You'll answer for this in the interrogation chambers!"

traits.locale_text: 「この異端者め！責任はお前にある！尋問室へ来い！」

languages.text: "Seni yaşlı kâfir! Bunun hesabını sorgu odasında vereceksin!"
languages.original_text: "You old heretic! You'll answer for this in the interrogation chambers!"

traits.locale_text: "Seni yaşlı kâfir! Bunun hesabını sorgu odasında vereceksin!"
